files.patch:
@@ -4,0 +4,1 @@
+Download and unzip the latest version from https://github.com/harfbuzz/harfbuzz/releases
@@ -31,0 +32,1 @@
+
@@ -33,0 +35,1 @@
+
@@ -36,0 +39,18 @@
+  To clean up the extra spaces and tabs run the following script at each folder level
+  within libharfbuzz
+
+  (shopt -s nullglob
+   for f in *.c *.h *.cc *.hh;
+      do
+        # replace tabs with spaces
+        expand ${f} > ${f}.tmp;
+        mv ${f}.tmp $f;
+
+        # fix line endings to LF
+        sed -i -e 's/\r$//g' ${f};
+
+        # remove trailing spaces
+        sed -i -e 's/[ ]* $//g' ${f};
+      done
+  )
+
